item.title: Short Form Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
COMPANY OVERVIEW
Byron Lifestyle Co solves everyday problems with useful but beautiful products, infused with style, innovation and creativity. We sell a range of products including baby products, reusable bags in custom prints, dog robes and more.
ROLE OVERVIEW
We are looking for someone to support our marketing and social media team with video editing and short-form video creation (predominantly for Instagram and TikTok). We are looking for someone who is creative, skilled at editing, and up-to-date with the latest trends and “what’s working” in social media and short-form video.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Video Editing
Video clips will be provided by the BLC team, which we will ask you to edit into short-form video (ranging from 5 seconds to approx 60 seconds in length).
We will provide a brief or “inspiraton” to guide your editing process, and the raw video footage / photos.
REQUIRED SKILLS
Technical Skills
Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, CapCut, InShot)
Familiarity with social media platforms (Instagram, TikTok) and their video requirements.
Creative Skills
Strong sense of visual storytelling and design.
Ability to create engaging and creative content that resonates with our audience.
Ability to remain consistent with the brand look and feel in creating the content.
Ability to take direction, follow instructions and act on feedback.

EXPERIENCE
Prior experience in social media video editing, preferably with a lifestyle or creative brand.
Portfolio / examples demonstrating previous work and creative flair.

OTHER
Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Excellent time management and ability to meet deadlines.


Hourly Range: $11.00-$33.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 00:31 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Final Cut Pro, CapCut, Instagram Reels, TikTok Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Final Cut Pro, CapCut, Instagram Reels, TikTok Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Looking for Engaging Spokesperson/ UGC to Present YouTube Videos! - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am seeking someone who can read off scripts and present themselves in person.

This person will be in charge of being the spokesperson for various topics related to softwares, applications, services, and programs.

The person would need to have the following:
- Good on camera prescence
- English accent
- Good camera
- Teleprompter
- Good lighting

This person will be filming themselves reading off a script.

Compensation will be $12 per script read. Scripts will range from 8-20 minutes long.

These videos will be posted onto YouTube and we will be using stillshots of you to create thumbnails as well.

Budget: $400
Posted On: July 01, 2024 00:28 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Voice-Over Recording, Male, Female, Spokesperson Video, Content Creation
Skills: Voice-Over Recording, Male, Female, Spokesperson Video, Content Creation

item.title: Experienced Video Editor for Instagram Reels and Shorts - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced Video Editor who specializes in creating engaging and eye-catching content for Instagram Reels and Shorts. The ideal candidate must have a strong understanding of the platform and its trends, and possess excellent editing skills to create visually appealing videos that capture and retain viewers' attention. This role will involve editing raw footage, adding effects and transitions, selecting appropriate music, and ensuring the final videos are of the highest quality. The successful candidate should be able to work independently, meet deadlines, and collaborate effectively with our creative team.

We don't have a lot of footage for this specific project, so you have to be creative with what we have.

Send your samples, we'll only reply to people who submit amazing work samples of catchy videos that can become viral.

Skills required:
- Proficient in video editing software
- Strong knowledge of Instagram Reels and Shorts
- Creative and innovative mindset
- Attention to detail and ability to work with tight deadlines
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills

Hourly Range: $5.00-$20.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 00:27 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Meme Creator for Social Media (Video and Static Posts) - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and creative meme creator to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of social media trends and the ability to craft engaging and original memes (both video and static) based on competition research we have gathered for our niche.

Responsibilities:

Create 30 original memes (both video and static) each month.
Utilize competition research to inform and inspire meme creation.
Ensure all memes are original and tailored to our artists' unique brand and voice.
Collaborate with our team to understand the brand's tone and style.
Deliver high-quality content within agreed deadlines.
Requirements:

Proven experience in meme creation for social media.
Strong portfolio showcasing both video and static meme content.
Ability to recreate and adapt existing memes to make them unique.
Familiarity with social media platforms and their specific content requirements.
Excellent communication skills and attention to detail.
Payment:

Please include your bulk price for creating 30 memes in your proposal. We are looking for a monthly arrangement.

Application Instructions:

To apply, please submit the following:

A brief cover letter explaining your experience and why you're a good fit for this role.
Links to your portfolio or examples of your previous work.
Your proposed bulk price for creating 30 memes.
Any additional information you think is relevant.
We look forward to seeing your creative work and potentially welcoming you to our team!

About Us:

We are a dynamic team dedicated to promoting our artists through engaging and relatable social media content. We believe in the power of humor and creativity to connect with our audience and are excited to find someone who shares this vision.


Posted On: June 30, 2024 23:39 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Social Media Imagery, Graphic Design, Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Social Media Content, Video Editing, Adobe Photoshop
Skills: Social Media Imagery, Graphic Design, Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Social Media Content, Video Editing, Adobe Photoshop
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Video Editor/Producer - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there! We are a YouTube Automation company looking for a talented, hard-working, and experienced video editor/producer to join our team.

We are looking for people experienced in video editing/producing for sports videos, particularly those in the darts niche (experience in the darts niche is ideal but not essential).

Similar channels/content to these:
https://www.youtube.com/@DartsFlix - (direct competitor, looking to do similar content ideas but better production quality)
https://www.youtube.com/@DartsWorldyt - (another direct competitor, wanting better production quality than their content too)
https://www.youtube.com/@officialpdc - (the big fish and official channel for the darts niche, looking at this competitor for content ideas)
https://www.youtube.com/@KickFlix - (example of the evergreen content style but adapted to darts, NOT football)

We offer an opportunity for a long-term collaboration, starting on a project basis. If we work well together, there's a potential for a full-time/retainer opportunity, allowing you to grow and advance within our company.

Please DO NOT apply if you do not have any experience.

Looking forward to working with you!
Danny

Hourly Range: $18.00-$32.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 23:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Video, Video Editing, Video Production, YouTube Automation, Sports
Skills: YouTube Video, Video Editing, Video Production, YouTube Automation, Sports
Country: Australia
click to apply
